nml_option.name: config_AM_activeTracers_budget_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member activeTracers_budget is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_activeTracers_budget_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often activeTracers_budget analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_activeTracers_budget_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_activeTracers_budget_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_activeTracers_budget_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: activeTracersBudgetAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the active tracers budget analysis member.

var.name: temperatureBudgetHadv
var.description: Horizontal advection term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: temperatureBudgetVadv
var.description: Vertical advection term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: temperatureBudgetHdif
var.description: Horizontal diffusion term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: temperatureBudgetVdif
var.description: Vertical diffusion term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: temperatureBudgetForc
var.description: Forcing term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: temperatureBudgetRate
var.description: Time rate of change term of the temperature budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetHadv
var.description: Horizontal advection term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetVadv
var.description: Vertical advection term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetHdif
var.description: Horizontal diffusion term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetVdif
var.description: Vertical diffusion term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetForc
var.description: Forcing term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)

var.name: salinityBudgetRate
var.description: Time rate of change term of the salinity budget equation (full 3D field)
